markdownRemark.html: In September 2016, I started a new project! I spent several weeks finishing an Angular 1.x single page app built with webpack. Next, I did some devops work using Ansible to configure a set of OpenStack VMs with a suite of docker containers integrated with docker-compose. Lately, I have been working on replacing a legacy service with a Node.js app.

frontmatter.title: Tech Talk on Container-less Java Services
